get.summary: List all compute specifications with capacity per zone.
Get detailed information about a specific compute offering.
get.description:
Get detailed information about a specific compute offering.

        Args:
            id: Compute ID in format "zone:spec" (e.g., "na-us-ca-sfo:s.small")

        Returns:
            {
                "object": "compute",
                "id": "na-us-ca-sfo:s.small",
                "spec": "s.small",
                "zone": "na-us-ca-sfo",
                "region": "na-us-ca-sfo",
                "cpu": 2,
                "ram": 4,
                "disk": 100,
                "capacity": 12,
                "pricing": {
                    "per_hour": 0.046,
                    "per_second": 0.0000127,
                    "currency": "USD"
                }
            }

post.summary: Claim a pool machine for active usage within an environment.
post.description:
Claim a pool machine for active usage within an environment.

        This grabs a pre-created machine from the pool, assigns it to the
        organization, and associates it with an environment.

        Request body:
        {
            "zone": "na-us-local-local-s",  # optional, defaults to first available
            "name": "sandbox",  # optional, default "sandbox"
            "environment": "personal",  # required, environment slug
            "autoenv": false,  # optional, auto-create environment if missing
        }

        Returns machine info.

post.summary: Create a new machine by purchasing a contract.
post.description:
Create a new machine by purchasing a contract.

        Request body:
        {
            "compute": "local_s.small",  # required, format: "zone_spec"
            "duration_minutes": 60,  # optional, default 15, min 15, max 1440
        }

        Returns machine info.
